name: Great Monsters - Try yourself
description:
In this game, there is a mission for clapping an endless multitude of moles that constantly stick their heads out of the burrows in the garden.

In their hands, they have stones, picks, ​and other useful tools that threaten the safety of your garden. But you are also well prepared and armed with a hammer, which helps you to quickly clap the army of annoying moles that is approaching you.

The rules of the game are notable for their simplicity. In order to win, it's enough to be extremely attentive and slap the moles on the heads of moles, which get out of their holes. But in doing so, you must necessarily prepare for the fact that with each stage they will become more and more, and you need to develop the speed of reaction.
Each tour lasts 30 seconds. During this time, you will need to slam the maximum number of moles.
Move by touching the screen. The game features interesting animation, as well as colorful graphics.
Features:
• As the game progresses, the speed increases;
• Ease of management.
• Unobtrusive gameplay with funny little animals is not annoying.
